external-actor-viewer.settings.reset.name: Reset settings to default
external-actor-viewer.settings.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
external-actor-viewer.settings.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
external-actor-viewer.settings.debug.name: Enable debugging
external-actor-viewer.settings.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
external-actor-viewer.settings.dialogs.resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
external-actor-viewer.settings.dialogs.resetsettings.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
